title: Large-Scale Overcoming Barriers to Ugandan Managersâ€™ eLearning Education and Designing Mathematical Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency, foundational grasp of business concepts, and fundamental statistical/graph interpretation capabilities

learning_goals: Analyze and explain at least three e-learning implementation barriers (infrastructure, digital literacy, pedagogy) using mathematical modeling (statistical/probability analysis).
